matchRegex.title: Match Regex
matchRegex.description: Pattern to replace. Use /g to replace all matches.

replaceExpr.title: Replace Expression
replaceExpr.description: A JavaScript expression or literal to replace the matching content. Capturing groups can be referenced as g1, g2, and so on, and event fields as event.<fieldName>.

disabled.description: Set to No to disable the evaluation of an individual rule

fields.title: Apply to fields
fields.description: Fields on which to apply the masking rules. Supports * wildcards, except when used on internal fields.

errorMessage.pattern: Internal fields cannot be used with wildcards.

depth.title: Depth
depth.description: Depth to which the Mask Function will search for fields to mask

flags.title: Evaluate fields
flags.description: Fields to evaluate if one or more masking rules are matched

value.title: Value Expression
value.description: JavaScript expression to compute the value (can be constant)
